EmailTemplate.name: Registration Loadout Location
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks so much for reaching out!
Your registration code is located inside your LoadOut on a separate insert. Just head on over to yeti.com/registration to get everything set up.
If we can help with anything else, never hesitate to reach out.
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
